post:
Hello! With another few weeks until we discount our hosting packages again for Christmas, why not take advantage of our new Buy One Get One Free offer? Simply order any shared package using code **50ANNUAL**, and then order another with the code **BOGOFF** and you'll pay $0 on your second order! 

In order for the promotional code to work, you must have paid the original invoice. Our shared hosting plans come with cPanel & CloudLinux, Free SSL via LetsEncrypt or cPanel AutoSSL, Free Softaculous Auto Installer and Free CloudFlare Protection. A dedicated IPv4 is available in NY for a $2 monthly fee.
